title: Rahu Transit in the 2nd House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 2nd house for Libra ascendant, focus intensifies on money, speech, and personal values. Desire to increase income and secure resources becomes strong, often through unconventional or risky means. Speech gains impact but can turn sharp or manipulative if unchecked. Family dynamics may feel strained due to priorities around wealth or control. This transit rewards strategic thinking and ethical discipline, while impulsive financial decisions can create instability.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Balance needed between desire and ethics

closing: This transit magnifies desire for security. With ethics and discipline, Rahu converts ambition into sustainable wealth.
